crochet hook for better result after completing the last st cut the yarn and pull each round is worked in a continuous spiral do on the loop to draw the tail using the tapestry not join rounds with slip_stitch or turn unless needle skip the next st and insert the needle from stated otherwise front to back under both loops go back to the last crochet through both loops unless stated st and insert the needle through the back loop of otherwise this st pull on the tail it is highly recommended that you read through the pattern completely before beginning to crochet material 2 0 mm hook or size suitable for yarn used tapestry needle embroidery needle fiberfill for stuffing yarn in the same size i used 4 ply cotton blend yarn in the following colors black white dark brown scissors dimension the size will vary depending on the yarn used if sewing/joining flat pieces you use the same materials as me the finished amigurumi is about 4 8 cm 1 9 tall starting on the first piece insert your needle under a crocheted stitch from back to front to abbreviation back on the corresponding stitch on the second piece insert the needle from front to back to front this pattern is written in us standard crochet under the stitch horizontally terms and assumes knowledge of basic stitches r = row/round magic_ring = magic_ring st = stitch/stitches single_crochet = single_crochet increase = single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet in the same st decrease = single_crochet decrease crochet 2 st together tip use invisible decrease for better finish half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch flo = front loops only ____ = repeat sequence between the square brackets for the indicated number of times __ = stitch count at
